Class BuildingClient

java.lang.Object
org.example.galaxy_trucker.View.ClientModel.States.PlayerStateClient
org.example.galaxy_trucker.View.ClientModel.States.BuildingClient
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class BuildingClient extends PlayerStateClient
Represents a client state for the "Building" phase of the game. This class extends PlayerStateClient and provides functionality specific to interacting with the building phase, such as visualizing the game state and retrieving commands relevant to this phase.
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • BuildingClient

      public BuildingClient()
      Default constructor for the BuildingClient class. Initializes an instance of the BuildingClient state, which represents a phase in the game where the client is engaged in building actions.

  • Method Details

    • showGame

      public void showGame(Out out)
      Displays the current game state during the "Building" phase by synchronizing access to the output object and rendering various game components through it. The method generates a text representation of the game state and sends it for rendering using the provided output mechanism.
      Overrides:
      showGame in class PlayerStateClient
      Parameters:
      out - the output object used to display the game state. It provides methods for retrieving relevant game data (e.g., players, game board, tiles, and deck) and ensures thread safety through synchronization.

    • showGame

      public void showGame(GuiOut out)
      Displays the "Building" phase of the game using the GUI output. This method updates the GUI to showcase the building scene and provides the necessary visual representation for the player to interact with during the building phase.
      Overrides:
      showGame in class PlayerStateClient
      Parameters:
      out - the GuiOut object that manages and displays the various GUI scenes, including the building scene.

    • getCommands

      public ArrayList<String> getCommands()
      Retrieves the list of available commands specific to the building phase of the game. These commands represent the possible actions a player can take in this state.
      Specified by:
      getCommands in class PlayerStateClient
      Returns:
      an ArrayList of Strings containing the commands: "Discard", "PickTile", "FinishBuilding", "InsertTile", "SeeDeck", "FromBuffer", and "ToBuffer".
